column4: Is there any way to remove windows without affecting on linux  in dual-boot system
If i remove Windows Partition doesn't any damage to grub?
you might need to do an update-grub after deleting the partition
after update grub, my system booted without any bootloader?
update-grub should remove windows from grub menu, that's all
ok, but it doesn't have any harm to load my ubuntu?
no, that's what update-grub is good for, but I am no expert to tell you 100% what will happen. You won't delete ubuntu surely'
one more question,after i remove Win,  is there any way to add space to my current file system ( my home ) ?
yes, but it depends on the partition table. use gparted for that.

you could pastebin 'sudo fdisk -l', so we can see what you need
